mapper.insert: select pos_postnatal.num,pos_user.name,pos_doctor.name,pos_nurse.name, pos_postnatal.startday,pos_postnatal.endday,pos_postnatal.baby,pos_postnatal.protect,pos_postnatal.emergencyphone from pos_postnatal join pos_user join pos_doctor join pos_nurse on pos_postnatal.num = pos_user.num = pos_doctor.docnum = pos_nurse.nurnum
